thread.title: OMG: Vishal attacked at Nadigar Sangam elections
thread.title_full: OMG: Vishal attacked at Nadigar Sangam elections - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: OMG: Vishal attacked at Nadigar Sangam elections
text:
Nadigar Sangam elections took yet another ugly turn on Sunday. We hear that actor Vishal was attacked at the venue and that he is reportedly injured. It is said that actress Sangeetha was manhandled by a mob at the election venue and when actor Vishal tried to intervene, he was attached and was injured in his right hand. 

The actor, we hear, is being given a special treatment inside the caravan. The police then immediately turned up at the venue and the voting is on in full swing. It was earlier said that when actor Mohan had reached the venue, someone had already cast a proxy vote for him.
